title: Niobrara National Scenic River: For Kids
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     For Kids              For Kids         Children set up a tent with a little help from park rangers. NPS Photo  Junior Ranger Booklet Check out the Niobrara National Scenic River Junior Ranger Booklet. Complete the activities for your age group and earn an official Junior Ranger badge! Junior Ranger Programs Join a park ranger for Junior Ranger programs every Sunday throughout the summer season. These hands-on programs are designed for kids 6-12 years old, but everyone is welcome to attend. Topics vary. Check the calendar for more information. Kids' Activities Stop by the visitor center on Saturdays for special weekly activities. Activities are on-going, so come by any time between 8:30 a.m. and 4:30 p.m. to make an animal, play a game, or look for fossils the way a paleontologist does it. See the calendar for more details. Web-based Activities Want to check out other cool web activities. visit the National Park Service WebRangers site.
